mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rooms (user_id, name, title, content, address, price, use_guide, building_type, latitude, longitude, max_guests, bedrooms, beds, bathrooms) VALUES (#{userId}, #{name}, #{title}, #{content}, #{address}, #{price}, #{useGuide}, #{buildingType}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{maxGuests}, #{bedrooms}, #{beds}, #{bathrooms});
mapper.select: SELECT name FROM users WHERE user_id = #{userId}
